title: Access Requirement Search Result Item
description: Result item of an Access Requirement search

createdOn.description: The creation date of the AR

modifiedOn.description: The last modification date of the AR

version.description: The current revision of the AR

reviewerIds.description: List of principal ids that are allowed to review the AR submissions
